data.name: RPGScenery - Dark Castle
data.detailed_description:
At the end of a seemingly endless bridge over a hot sea of lava stands a massive stone gate whose pillars are adorned with non-figurative patterns. Beyond the gate, corridors richly decorated with sculptures rise out of the glowing lava and run into a circular room. On the perforated stone floor of the room, hot air flows from the molten magma swirling below. Beyond the hall is another corridor leading to a colossal tower. At the top of the building is a statue of a human figure staring silently into nothingness, and at the bottom is a gate that leads to the dark castle.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10/
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
